mapper.select:
select average2, hygiene2, comfort2, technique2, price2, service2 from (select round(avg(rvw_HYGIENE),1) hygiene2, round(avg(rvw_COMFORT),1) comfort2, round(avg(rvw_TECHNIQUE),1) technique2, round(avg(rvw_PRICE),1) price2, round(avg(rvw_SERVICE),1) service2, round(avg((rvw_HYGIENE+rvw_COMFORT+rvw_TECHNIQUE+rvw_PRICE+rvw_SERVICE)/5),1) average2 from review r, enterprise e
where r.etp_num = e.etp_num ) group by average2, hygiene2, comfort2, technique2, price2, service2
